flawed_nl_solution:
Greta the goose eats 20/10=<<20/10=2>>2 pounds of food per day.
Milton the mouse eats (1/100)*2=0.02 of a pound of food per day.
Elmer the elephant eats 4000*(0.02)=<<4000*(0.02)=80>>80 pounds of food per day.
Thus, Elmer eats 80-20=56 pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60.0, not 56.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
